content.raw:
I think you probably figured it out already, but just in case, to make ducks rain I used [this PR](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/143/a-6-user-command-spawn-factory-create/diff) and this command:

~~~
ign service -s /world/empty/create \
--reqtype ignition.msgs.EntityFactory \
--reptype ignition.msgs.Boolean \
--timeout 300 \
--req 'sdf: '\
'"<?xml version=\"1.0\" ?>'\
'<sdf version=\"1.6\">'\
'<model name=\"duck1\">'\
'<pose>0 0 3 0.0 0.0</pose>'\
'<link name=\"link\">'\
'<inertial>'\
'<inertia>'\
'<ixx>3.92</ixx>'\
'<ixy>0</ixy>'\
'<ixz>0</ixz>'\
'<iyy>3.92</iyy>'\
'<iyz>0</iyz>'\
'<izz>3.92</izz>'\
'</inertia>'\
'<mass>39</mass>'\
'</inertial>'\
'<collision name=\"collision\">'\
'<pose>0 0 -0.4 1.57 0.0 0.0</pose>'\
'<geometry>'\
'<mesh>'\
'<scale>0.5 0.5 0.5</scale>'\
'<uri>file://test/media/duck_collider.dae</uri>'\
'</mesh>'\
'</geometry>'\
'</collision>'\
'<visual name=\"visual\">'\
'<pose>0 0 -0.4 1.57 0.0 0.0</pose>'\
'<geometry>'\
'<mesh>'\
'<scale>0.5 0.5 0.5</scale>'\
'<uri>file://test/media/duck.dae</uri>'\
'</mesh>'\
'</geometry>'\
'</visual>'\
'</link>'\
'</model>'\
'</sdf>" '\
'pose: {position: {x: 7, y: 3, z: 10}} '\
'name: "new_name" '\
'allow_renaming: true'
~~~
content.html:
I think you probably figured it out already, but just in case, to make ducks rain I used this PR and this command:

ign service -s /world/empty/create \
--reqtype ignition.msgs.EntityFactory \
--reptype ignition.msgs.Boolean \
--timeout 300 \
--req 'sdf: '\
'"<?xml version=\"1.0\" ?>'\
'<sdf version=\"1.6\">'\
'<model name=\"duck1\">'\
'<pose>0 0 3 0.0 0.0</pose>'\
'<link name=\"link\">'\
'<inertial>'\
'<inertia>'\
'<ixx>3.92</ixx>'\
'<ixy>0</ixy>'\
'<ixz>0</ixz>'\
'<iyy>3.92</iyy>'\
'<iyz>0</iyz>'\
'<izz>3.92</izz>'\
'</inertia>'\
'<mass>39</mass>'\
'</inertial>'\
'<collision name=\"collision\">'\
'<pose>0 0 -0.4 1.57 0.0 0.0</pose>'\
'<geometry>'\
'<mesh>'\
'<scale>0.5 0.5 0.5</scale>'\
'<uri>file://test/media/duck_collider.dae</uri>'\
'</mesh>'\
'</geometry>'\
'</collision>'\
'<visual name=\"visual\">'\
'<pose>0 0 -0.4 1.57 0.0 0.0</pose>'\
'<geometry>'\
'<mesh>'\
'<scale>0.5 0.5 0.5</scale>'\
'<uri>file://test/media/duck.dae</uri>'\
'</mesh>'\
'</geometry>'\
'</visual>'\
'</link>'\
'</model>'\
'</sdf>" '\
'pose: {position: {x: 7, y: 3, z: 10}} '\
'name: "new_name" '\
'allow_renaming: true'
